author: coindesk.com
title: BTC's 200-Week Average Rises To $50K To Suggest Long-Term Market Strength
description:
The 200-Week Simple Moving Average (200WMA) for bitcoin BTC is approaching $50,000, currently sitting at approximately $49,223, according to Glassnode data. 
This is one of the very few indicators in bitcoin that has only risen over time. The 200WMA has histo…
